summary: Tod and Copper still go together like an itch and a scratch, but when Copper gets a shot at the big time with a nutty group of hound dog howlers, their purebred friendship is put to the test.

keywords: shaking one's butt|numbered sequel|fair|digit in title|number 2 in title
title: Tod y Toby 2
